review: It is easy set-up and to use and I easily set-up my iPhone as a remote control. Content is not as good as on Apple TV. I got the Fire TV Stick mainly to gain access to Amazon Prime video content. The Amazon site could be better at filtering TV Stick-only applications. I ended up downloading applications that did not work with the TV Stick even though the Amazon filter indicated the applications would work.
